inputs: Create a modern, minimalist logo on a white background that is a text that says: '{text_0}' colored {subject_clr_0}. The thick text MUST be in two lines, except if it is only one word. The logo text '{text_0}' is a modern simple but stylish font that is thick. The color of the text is changed inside an invisible {shape} from {subject_clr_0} to {subject_clr_1}. The overall design should feel sleek, tech-forward, and unique. The logo is only text with the color difference not images.

parameters.negative_prompt: no photorealsism ,no shadows, no bevel, no gradients outside the shapes, no textures, no metallic effects, no photographs, no bends in the logo, no background patterns, no extra text, no glowing effects.
